title: Bulova Men's 98E100 Windemere Watch
features: Water resistant to 99 feet (30 M): withstands rain and splashes of water, but not showering or submersion
description: A ring of diamonds accents this luxurious, silver-and-gold-tone Bulova timepiece. The Bulova Men's Windemere Watch features a polished stainless steel strap accented by horizontal gold-tone stripes. A stainless steel case houses a white dial that's framed by a gold-tone stainless steel bezel. The bezel is studded with diamonds and engraved with black Roman numeral hour indicators at the three, six, nine, and 12 o'clock positions. Gold-tone stick hour indicators on the dial complement gold tones found on the luminescent hands, trio of subdials, and Bulova logo. Black stick minute markers and square accents complete this stunning timepiece. The Bulova Men's Windemere Watch is water resistant to 99 feet.
